content: Singaporean naval officer **Lew Chuen Hong** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 刘全康) is a Singaporean former two-star [rear-admiral](/wiki/Rear-admiral) who served as [Chief of Navy](/wiki/Chief_of_Navy_(Singapore)) between 2017 and 2020. He is the [chief executive officer](/wiki/Chief_executive_officer) of [Infocomm Media Development Authority](/wiki/Infocomm_Media_Development_Authority) (IMDA), and the commissioner for Personal Data Protection Commission (PDPC). Military officesPreceded by[Lai Chung Han](/wiki/Lai_Chung_Han) **Chief of Navy of the [Republic of Singapore Navy](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore_Navy)** 2017–2020Succeeded by[Aaron Beng](/wiki/Aaron_Beng) This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Lew Chuen Hong
